Rulings.Base:
1. This card targets the "Karakuri" monster.
2. If the "Karakuri" monster is flipped face-down by "Book of Moon" before this card resolves, you still resolve the effect normally. The "Karakuri" monster will be changed to face-up Attack Position.
3. You add a monster to your hand and change the target monster's battle position at the same time.
4. If you can't add a monster to your hand, you don't change the battle position of the target monster.
5. If you can't change the battle position of the target monster, you still add a monster to your hand. This includes if the target monster is no longer on the field.
